Using AI To Boost Engagement Across Your Network

Lately I've been using AI to create images so that I can promote my website on social media.

Images tend to get more engagement than words alone.

Part of my goals include teaching more hispanic/latinos how to code because they're a very underrepresented group in the technology industry.

Using Dall-E

Theirs a lot of AI options out there to generate images but I'm keeping it basic and using Dall-E which gives you the option of creating up to 15 free images in a 24 hour period which is more than enough to regularly post. With some simple request to Dall-E you can generate images that are completing free to you.
